name: Data Compressed - rar.exe
description: An adversary may compress data (e.g., sensitive documents) that is collected prior to exfiltration in order to make it portable and minimize the amount of data sent over the network.
false_positives: Highly likely if rar is a default archiver in the monitored environment.
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(process.executable:*\\rar.exe AND process.command_line:*\ a\ *)`
